description: Lists Amazon Inspector coverage details for a specific vulnerability.

parameters.name: filterCriteria
parameters.description: The criteria used to filter the results of a vulnerability search. The IDs for specific vulnerabilities. (string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination parameter to be used on the next list operation to retrieve more items.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilities
nested_items.description: Details about the listed vulnerability.

nested_items.name: firstSeen
nested_items.description: The date and time this vulnerability was first observed.

nested_items.name: lastSeen
nested_items.description: The date and time this vulnerability was last observed.

nested_items.name: targets
nested_items.description: The commercial sectors this vulnerability targets.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ttps
nested_items.description: The MITRE ATT&CK tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) associated with vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The remediation action recommended by CISA for this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: dateAdded
nested_items.description: The date and time CISA added this vulnerability to their catalogue.

nested_items.name: dateDue
nested_items.description: The date and time CISA expects a fix to have been provided vulnerability.

nested_items.name: baseScore
nested_items.description: The CVSS v2 base score for the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: The scoring vector associated with the CVSS v2 score.

nested_items.name: baseScore
nested_items.description: The CVSS v3 base score for the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: scoringVector
nested_items.description: The scoring vector associated with the CVSS v3 score.

nested_items.name: cwes
nested_items.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) associated with the vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the vulnerability.

nested_items.name: detectionPlatforms
nested_items.description: Platforms that the vulnerability can be detected on.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The Exploit Prediction Scoring System (EPSS) score.

nested_items.name: exploitObserved
nested_items.description: An object that contains details on when the exploit was observed.

nested_items.name: firstSeen
nested_items.description: The date an time when the exploit was first seen.

nested_items.name: lastSeen
nested_items.description: The date an time when the exploit was last seen.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID for the specific vulnerability.

nested_items.name: referenceUrls
nested_items.description: Links to various resources with more information on this vulnerability.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: relatedVulnerabilities
nested_items.description: A list of related vulnerabilities.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the vulnerability information. Possible results are RHEL, AMAZON_CVE, DEBIAN or NVD.

nested_items.name: sourceUrl
nested_items.description: A link to the official source material for this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: vendorCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the vendor created this vulnerability.

nested_items.name: vendorSeverity
nested_items.description: The severity assigned by the vendor.

nested_items.name: vendorUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the vendor last updated this vulnerability.
